tweet: @Gasinmablunt Thanks for asking. We have made significant changes in the way we work with our supplying farms and are continuing to improve our policies and practices. You can learn more about our ongoing animal welfare governance here:  https://t.co/yluMBFgkKD
name: fairlife

tweet: PM Modi's policies - such as PM Kisan - and specifically 3 farm laws empower small farmers. It is they who would benefit with new technology, better market access & logistics.  It is THIS REASON WHY MINISCULE MINORITY OF FARMERS ARE PROTESING while rest of India is supporting.5/5
name: Akhilesh Mishra

tweet: Farm loan waivers; insurance policies that only went to those who took farm loans (by definition big farmers);  few states monopolizing MSP procurement and that too through Arhtiyas - all of this favored bigger/richer farmers.  All this while the small farmer was left behind. 4/5
name: Akhilesh Mishra
